suggest.meta_keywords: WritableStream, Streams API, JavaScript, streaming data, web development, backpressure mechanism, data stream handling, WritableStream methods, WritableStream properties, web APIs
suggest.meta_description: Explore the WritableStream interface of the Streams API, crucial for handling data streaming with backpressure, properties, and methods in web development.

current.meta_description: The WritableStream interface is a part of the Streams API that provides a standardized way to write streaming data to a sink(destination). It comes with its own queuing and backpressure mechanism to ensure that the data is written in an efficient way.
